name: Origami iBGT Auto-Compounder
description: Origami Finance is the first tokenised leverage protocol on Ethereum and Berachain. Fully integrated with third-party lenders, Origami allows users to achieve non-custodial leveraged exposure to popular looping and other yield strategies via a familiar vault UX. Origami vaults are fully automated to eliminate tedious reward harvesting, maximise capital efficiency, and minimise liquidation risk for the underlying position.
